result.markdown:
---
title: cli package notes
description: Notes on cli commands
format: html
categories: [r]
editor: source
toc: true
toc-depth: 6
toc-location: right
fontsize: medium #small, medium, large, 1.2em, 12px, ...
execute:
  echo: true #whether to include code block
  eval: true #whether to run code
  warning: true #include warnings
  error: false #include errors
  output: true #include output
  # include: false #catch all for  preventing any results (code + results)
image: "thumbnail.png"
---

::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
first <- "John"
last <- "Doe"

cli_text("hello world")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
hello world
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_text(col_blue("hello")," world")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
hello world
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_text("asdf {.emph first} ")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
asdf first
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_text("asdf {.emph first}")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
asdf first
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fun <- function() {
  cli_div(theme = list(span.emph = list(color = "orange")))
  cli_text("This is very {.emph important}")
  cli_end()
  cli_text("Back to the {.emph previous theme}")
}
fun()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
This is very important
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Back to the previous theme
```
:::
:::






### Alerts


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_alert_success("Updated database.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
✔ Updated database.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_alert_info("Reopened database.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
ℹ Reopened database.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_alert_warning("Cannot reach GitHub, using local database cache.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
! Cannot reach GitHub, using local database cache.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_alert_danger("Failed to connect to database.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
✖ Failed to connect to database.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_alert("A generic alert")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
→ A generic alert
```
:::
:::



### Headings


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_h1("Heading 1")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Heading 1 ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_h2("Heading 2")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Heading 2 ──
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cli_h3("Heading 3")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Heading 3 
```
:::
:::


### Lists


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fun <- function() {
  cli_ol()
  cli_li("Item 1")
  ulid <- cli_ul()
  cli_li("Subitem 1")
  cli_li("Subitem 2")
  cli_end(ulid)
  cli_li("Item 2")
  cli_end()
}
fun()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
1. Item 1
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
  • Subitem 1
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
  • Subitem 2
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
2. Item 2
```
:::
:::
